Settings
Daily wallpaper updater When activated, the app is going to automatically update the wallpaper everyday
Download over cellular When activated, the app is going to download images when the device is not connected to a WiFi network, be careful, images can be huge.
Wallpaper screen Define the screen where the wallpaper is going to automatically be set when the service is activated Lock screen Home screen Both
Quality Define the resolution of the images, the high quality requires more storage and network data Medium"> High
Max age of data Define the maximum of time the images are going to be stored, after that, if a record is older (and is not a favorite) is going to be deleted. One month Three months Six months One year
Default photo For some days, an image can not be retrieved, define if the app is going to take a random photo between your favorites, or a default one instead Random Random between favorites
